TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AspNetWebSocketContext extends System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketContext
Public MustInherit Class AspNetWebSocketContext Inherits WebSocketContext
public ref class AspNetWebSocketContext abstract : System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocketContext

summary.span: 提供基底類別，表示個別 要求的內容詳細資料。

span.span: Provides a base class that represents contextual details about an individual request.

The virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為虛擬路徑，url 的範例`http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail`，這個屬性的值是`/virdir/page.html`。As an example of a virtual path, for the URL `http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail`, the value of this property is `/virdir/page.html`.

The virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為虛擬路徑，url 的範例`http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail`，這個屬性的值是`/tail`。As an example of a virtual path, for the URL `http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html/tail`, the value of this property is `/tail`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property QueryString As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 從用戶端傳送的 訊息中取得查詢字串變數的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of query string variables from an message that was sent by the client.

value.span: 用戶端送出的查詢字串變數的集合。

span.span: The collection of query string variables that was sent by the client.

value.span: 例如，如果要求 URL，則 http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44 ，這個屬性會傳回包含單一項目，其值的集合識別碼 = 44。

span.span: For example, if the request URL is http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44, this property returns a collection that contains a single item whose value is id=44.
The property is not implemented.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RawUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ RawUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在用戶端所傳送的 訊息中，取得網站名稱後面的 URL 部分。

span.span: Gets the portion of a URL that follows the website name in an message that was sent by the client.

value.span: URL 的一部分，位在網站名稱後面。

span.span: The part of the URL that follows the website name.

value.span: 例如，如果完整要求 URL 是 http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44 ，這個屬性的值是/default.aspx?id=44。

span.span: For example, if the complete request URL is http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44, the value of this property is /default.aspx?id=44.
The property is not implemented.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Unvalidated As UnvalidatedRequestValuesBase
public: virtual property System::Web::UnvalidatedRequestValuesBase ^ Unvalidated { System::Web::UnvalidatedRequestValuesBase ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 訊息中送出的一個或多個欄位值的未驗證版本。

span.span: Gets unvalidated versions of one or more field values that are submitted in an message.
The unvalidated values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未經驗證的值尚未由 ASP.NET 要求驗證檢查及可能包含標記，指令碼，或保留字元。An unvalidated value has not been checked by ASP.NET request validation and might contain markup, script, or reserved characters. 如需有關要求驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about request validation, see .

span.span: The property is not implemented.

span.para: 如果您覆寫這個屬性在衍生類別中的，您必須手動檢查潛在的跨網站指令碼攻擊的資料。
If you override this property in a derived class, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.
